bio.long: **Anders joined Vendia as a product marketer.** With a passion for positioning, messaging strategy, and all things go-to-market, Anders loves building things. He also loves impromptu travel, fresh lobster rolls, and wordplay.

**Brian joined Vendia as a Solutions Architect** focused on helping customers develop products and services using the Vendia Share platform. He loves helping startups and enterprises alike as we solve big, hard problems like infrastructure automation challenges.

**Caroll leads as the Head of Growth Marketing**. She's built growth engines and teams for startups, big tech, and nonprofits alike. Caroll loves puzzles, reading fiction, and long walks. She may be 65 or 35, hard to say.
**David is a Senior Solutions Architect** who likes helping customers solve hard problems, building fun solutions to life's little problems, and enjoying time outdoors with his wife and son.

**Francine is a Senior Solutions Architect** who enjoys all things data — and she has the personal library collection to prove it. Francine particularly loves to empower companies building data-driven solutions with the right design, architecture, tools, processes, and, of course, people. Catch her as a frequent voice with guests in the Circles of Trust podcast.

**Hailey leads as Head of Design.** A passionate user experience designer, Hailey’s expertise extends programming, UX design, UI design, graphic design, motion graphics and animation. She loves mentoring emerging designers and enjoys reading the latest, greatest fantasy and science fiction.

bio.short: Director of Solution Architecture and Customer Success
bio.long: **James leads as the Director of Solutions Architecture and Customer Success.** He’s passionate about matching digital innovation with customer challenges to create novel, impactful solutions at scale. (He’s also an advocate for the perfect cup of tea.) Look for James in [The New Stack](https://thenewstack.io/author/james-gimourginas/) and as a frequent guest in our [Circles of Trust](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/circles-of-trust/id1645908970) podcast.

authors.name: James Gimourginas
authors.jobTitle: Director of Solutions Architecture and Customer Success

bio.long: **Renee leads as Head of Talent.** She’s as passionate about matching brilliant, kind humans to the perfect role at Vendia as she is about building efficient, scalable practices. She also loves Broadway musicals, pizza, dogs of all sizes, and public libraries.
**Shruthi is a co-founder and the Chief Business Officer at Vendia.**

**Tim is a co-founder and the Chief Executive Officer at Vendia.** Known as the "Father of Serverless," Tim started the Serverless movement when he created the AWS Lambda business and technology in 2012.

**Vikrant joined Vendia as a Solutions Architect.** Prior to Vendia, he worked as a Principal Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services (AWS). At AWS, he worked on several large scale Digital Transformation programs and authored new solutions for HCLS, Auto, and Manufacturing.

**Alex is a Solutions Specialist** and an avid learner who loves to use new technology to solve old problems. He brings experience in developing data warehousing tools as well as solutions engineering to help empower customers big and small. He also bakes an amazing lasagne.

**Li is a Solutions Architect.** He loves helping customers adopt the lastest innovative technologies. When not working on his own entrepreneurial efforts and mentoring, he likes spending time with his family and learning new skills.
Vendia's team of ingenuitive, world-class engineers hail from AWS, Netlify, Stripe, Mulesoft, Tealium, Gitlab, Microsoft, and more.
